Profile Summary
Experienced Human Resources Specialist with a demonstrated history of working in the chemicals industry, Skilled in HR Operations, with excellent communication skills and strong business development. Professional with a Bachelor's degree from Ain Shams University.
Professional Strengths:
Possess excellent organization and management skills
Possess excellent written and verbal communication skills
Proficient with computer literate such as Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel and Internet.
Excellent ability to work with all levels of internal and external stakeholders
Goal oriented: results achiever, meeting deadlines
Dependability  Yostina F. Habshy 			  			                 Mobile: +971558458898			                                                      Email: yostina.adly@gmail.com
Profile Summary
Experienced Human Resources Specialist with a demonstrated history of working in the chemicals industry, Skilled in HR Operations, with excellent communication skills and strong business development. Professional with a Bachelor's degree from Ain Shams University.
Professional Strengths:
Possess excellent organization and management skills
Possess excellent written and verbal communication skills
Proficient with computer literate such as Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel and Internet.
Excellent ability to work with all levels of internal and external stakeholders
Goal oriented: results achiever, meeting deadlines
Dependability on the work tasks
Organized and Detail Oriented
Planning skills to achieve and prioritize job tasks and projects
Team player
Honesty and Integrity
Self-Motivated
Professional Experience:
Saudi Basics Industries Corporation (SABIC, Dubai)                                                                 May 2018 until Present 								            Specialist, HR &Admin.(UAE, Jordan and Iraq)
Recruitment & Selection
Leads all activities and tasks related to attracting, recruiting, developing, motivating, and effectively utilize the right human capital needed to achieve the objectives of SABIC Dubai office internally and on the regional based business needs.
Support the department managers with the interviewing process to assess candidateâ€™s eligibility.
Advise the line managers with the right practices in regards recruitment to align with our compensation and grading system.
Ensure the receiving of all related documents prior to employee recruitment such as approval, job description, legal documents, and requisition forms.
Responsible for maintaining all the on boarding activities for the new joiners and implement all the needed setup.
Payroll and Compensation & Benefits
Lead the payroll closure procedure to ensure payment is done within the timeframe and company policy and procedure.
Responsible for processing other employee benefits such as bonus, travel expenses, annual tickets while maintaining high levels of confidentiality.
Review the timesheet for the contractors (outsource staff) for accurate attendance and overtime verification.
Maintain the HR database for all the employees through SAP HR.
Managing the promotion cycle internally for all the office functions according to HR MEA guidelines.
Employee Relations
Apply HR policies and procedures with fairness and integrity to maintain good working relations through the company.
Plan and conduct new employee orientation program.
Manage staff medical insurance and handle all the requests or and raised concerns as a focal with the medical department and the insurance company.
Manage all labour relations and government reporting activities including the trade license registration, visa renewals and any other required activities.
Foster a diverse, inclusive community with a positive values based to ensure better work conditions overall the year.
Policies and Procedures
Review and update the local policies and procedures in coordination with the Corporate HR in the HQ and recommend changes to the HRBP in according to the local labour law.
Administer policies and procedures within the office through a frequent communication.
Follow up using the right channels like, presentations, notices or memo when needed.
Training & development
Assist in coordinating, organizing and conducting training sessions to the team.
Coordinate with the line managers for training needs identification based on the individual development plan.
Maintaining training records for all of staff to monitor development and program effectiveness.
Performance Management
Monitor the performance review process through the office in order to meet the required deadlines and to ensure the process effectiveness.
Ensure receiving the related communication regards the performance cycle and assist the staff for the system access/issues.
Maintaining the records of the performance results through SAP for promotion purposes.
Office Management O
